allPosts.title: My productive WFH setup introduction and desk tour of 2022
allPosts.excerpt: Last year, I was WFH for most of time, that made me to reconsider my desktop setups and working environment at home. I did some research, DIY some gadgets, bought some LED strips, two monitors, monitor stands, mechanical keyboard and new mouse. Iteratively to change the layout and reorganize the cables. It was a such great time to rethinking how the setups and arrangements can affect my daily work and productivity.

allPosts.title: New Apple Silicon M1 Pro Chip MacBook Pro Hands-on and First Impression
allPosts.excerpt: I have used this M1 Pro Chip MacBook Pro for about one week now. I have to say it’s really fast! I can not feel any lagging issues during my daily development workflow. Additionally, the 120 Herts refresh rate gives me a new level of screen experience.

allPosts.title: Cable management solution: how to keep clean when I move the laptop outside the desk
allPosts.excerpt: Recently, I am obsessed with reordering or organizing my little pieces of stuff. For example, cable management is a great topic it is hard to say it’s perfect at any time. How to organize your tools or material make them easy to store and find is really a fascinating challenge.
